name: 9618 AL CS Paper 4
desc: This repo contains all solutions to all 9618 Cambridge A Level Computer Science Paper 4 Questions with model answers in Python

name: Expense Tracker
desc: This Project contains a very simple and responsive Expense Tracker in React where you can add and track past Expenses & Incomes

name: Quiz App
desc: This is a completely random generated quiz app made with Tailwind CSS in React that is fully automated and customizable by fetching from an API

name: Tic Tac Toe App
desc: Fully Functional Tic Tac Toe game in React Js - needs some UI updates but focused on functionality

name: Calculator App
desc: This is a simple calculator with a clean UI and fully functional in Vanilla HTML, CSS and JS
